parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Continue sequence of [[for]] construct. It sets the start value of the index variable.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> for [[from]] b

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> for: [[For Type]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> b: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[For Type]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[for]] "_x" [[from]] 10 [[to]] 20 [[do]] {..code..}</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Control Structures]]
</value></part></template>
